adjective.description: Relating to or characteristic of the ancient city of Meroe, located in present-day Sudan, or its inhabitants or language.

noun.description: A native or citizen of the ancient city of Meroe, located in present-day Sudan.
examples: the Meroitics processed the ore near the river

noun.description: The language spoken in the ancient city of Meroe, located in present-day Sudan.
examples: one of the longest known monumental texts in Meroitic
